H0.text: Which French artist, along with Picasso, was a founder of Cubism ? He designed sets for Diaghilev ballets and was awarded the Legion D'Honneur. Among his works are "The Woman Musician" and "The Candlestick".". Georges Rouault

H1.text: Which French artist, along with Picasso, was a founder of Cubism ? He designed sets for Diaghilev ballets and was awarded the Legion D'Honneur. Among his works are "The Woman Musician" and "The Candlestick".". Marc Chagall

H2.text: Which French artist, along with Picasso, was a founder of Cubism ? He designed sets for Diaghilev ballets and was awarded the Legion D'Honneur. Among his works are "The Woman Musician" and "The Candlestick".". Maurice Denis

H3.text: Which French artist, along with Picasso, was a founder of Cubism ? He designed sets for Diaghilev ballets and was awarded the Legion D'Honneur. Among his works are "The Woman Musician" and "The Candlestick".". Braque
